hero.mainTitle: rooms & apartments in Florence city center
hero.valueProp: Book your stay at myhomeinflorence.com – fully furnished rooms & apartments in San Niccolò, steps from Ponte Vecchio. Better than Airbnb: direct booking, self check-in, affordable parking outside ZTL. Your alternative to Florence hotels and vacation rentals.

about.title: My Home In Florence by Lorenzo & Lorenzo
about.description:
Looking for an Airbnb alternative in Florence? Book directly at myhomeinflorence.com and experience authentic Florentine hospitality. Our fully furnished rooms and apartments in the historic San Niccolò neighborhood offer affordable vacation rentals just steps from Ponte Vecchio and Florence city center.
Lorenzo & Lorenzo host with the warmth of longtime friends, creating a welcoming atmosphere where guests feel like family – surrounded by cafés, osterie, pizzerie, bakeries, art galleries and local shops that capture the real Florentine spirit.
about.snippet: Meet "Il Bello" and "Il Vagge" — two longtime friends who turned their San Niccolò apartment into a welcoming guest house, now one of Florence's top-rated vacation rentals.
about.hostsAlt: Lorenzo & Lorenzo hosts - Airbnb Superhosts in Florence

neighborhood.title: Discover Our Neighborhood
neighborhood.description: Stay in San Niccolò, a historic neighborhood within Florence's ancient walls, steps from the Arno and Ponte Vecchio, full of cafés, osterie, art galleries and small local shops. Our reception and main base of operations are right here, even though we host rooms and apartments across Florence, so every walking distance mentioned below refers to this San Niccolò home base.
neighborhood.extraNote: We also have rooms and apartments all around Florence! Check Booking.com and Airbnb to discover all our properties.

rooms.title: Rooms & Apartments
rooms.description: Each room and apartment is thoughtfully designed with vintage Italian furnishings, combining comfort with character so you can feel at home while discovering Florence.

list.title: Double Room with Private External Bathroom
list.description: A 14 m² double room with its own private external bathroom just across the hall, ideal for couples who want an affordable stay with privacy.

list.title: Deluxe Apartment
list.description: A 65 m² apartment designed for up to four guests, with Bedroom 1 featuring a large double bed and the living room offering a comfortable sofa bed for extra travelers.

list.title: Studio Apartment
list.description: A 45 m² studio apartment that sleeps up to four guests with Bedroom 1 offering a large double bed and the living room providing a comfy sofa bed, complete with kitchenette and private bath.

list.title: Torretta sull'Arno Apartment
list.description: A river-view loft just above the Arno with room for four guests, two beds, a kitchenette and a workspace overlooking Florence.

list.title: Casa Fabbri in Rifredi
list.description: A bright family apartment in Rifredi with room for four, easy tram connections, and a full kitchen to cook like a local.

list.title: Casa San Frediano 36
list.description: A welcoming Oltrarno apartment near San Frediano, perfect for exploring cafés and artisan shops with friends.

list.title: Studio San Niccolò
list.description: A cozy studio for two in San Niccolò with kitchenette and modern comforts steps from the Arno.

amenities.title: Everything You Need for Your Stay
amenities.subtitle: Essentials, comfort and little extras that make Lorenzo & Lorenzo feel like home.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Florence?
cta.description: Book your stay with us and discover the authentic heart of Florence. We can't wait to welcome you.

hosts.title: Your Hosts
hosts.subtitle: Two friends who turned their love for Florence into a home for travelers.
hosts.bio: Locals know them as "Il Bello" and "Il Vagge": Lorenzo Bellini, with a sun-worn Tuscan face and big hands that fix everything from elevators to tricky situations, and Lorenzo Vaggelli, the blonde with shy eyes and a wild beard who happily crosses Florence on foot to visit friends. Together they run their San Niccolò bed & breakfast in the same Oltrarno streets where it all began – a little village inside the city, between the Arno and the climb to San Miniato, dotted with cafés, bakeries, galleries and trattorie – welcoming guests with the warmth and humour of true Florentines.

parking.title: Affordable Parking in Florence
parking.subtitle: Guest parking outside the ZTL – €20/day or €120/week
parking.intro: Finding parking in Florence is challenging, but we've got you covered. Our exclusive parking is strategically located just outside Florence's limited traffic zone (ZTL), so you can arrive by car, park affordably, and explore the historic city center on foot. The best parking solution for visitors to Florence.
parking.contact: Planning your visit to Florence? Contact lorenzoelorenzo@libero.it for parking availability and reservations.

items.location: Strategic location just outside the ZTL, close to Florence historic center and major attractions.
items.pricing: Affordable Florence parking rates – competitive pricing for short and long stays.
items.booking: Book in advance for guaranteed parking, especially during peak tourist seasons in Florence.

faq.title: Florence Travel FAQ
faq.subtitle: Answers about Florence tourist tax, parking, check-in and more.

lateCheckin.q: Can I arrive late to my Florence accommodation?
lateCheckin.a: Yes! Late arrivals are no problem at Lorenzo & Lorenzo. Just let us know your expected arrival time and we'll coordinate self check-in directly with you. Our Florence apartments and rooms all offer flexible check-in.

luggage.q: Can I store luggage before check-in or after check-out?
luggage.a: Yes, we offer complimentary luggage storage for our guests. Let us know in advance and we'll arrange secure storage before check-in or after check-out – perfect for exploring Florence on your arrival or departure day.

parking.q: Is there affordable parking in Florence city center?
parking.a: Yes! We offer private guest parking just outside the ZTL (limited traffic zone) at €20/day or €120/week – one of the most affordable parking options near Florence center. See our Parking section for full details.

touristTax.q: What is the Florence tourist tax (tassa di soggiorno)?
touristTax.a: Florence charges a city tourist tax starting from €6.00 per person per night, for up to 7 nights. This tassa di soggiorno is set by the Municipality of Florence and applies to all accommodations. Contact us for specific rates based on accommodation type.
